short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Captures ecommerce activity and helps users keep track of online purchases and savings made from those purchases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In a world where the cost of living is increasing by the day, saving money on purchases, earning rewards, and helping others save money has become forever more important. 

We have revolutionised the way customers view, track and benefit from their ecommerce data. With our free browser extension, users can capture data related to their online purchase and have it displayed in a single dashboard view. From here users can view savings made, money spent online and opt to share data such as coupon/promo codes with other users in real-time, and receive rewards.
